data.benefits: Scheme provides one-time CAPEX support of up to 25% of the eligible CAPEX expenditure, subject to a maximum ceiling of Rs. 10000 lakhs  for creating (co-working space, IT/ITeS park).
data.eligibility: All existing IT/ITeS units whho are developer/consortium of developers for the creation of  IT township or IT city are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Eligible Unit means any existing unit having a minimum of 15 employees on its payroll. Gross fixed capital investment must be less than Rs.25000 lakhs. 
  2. The expenditure incurred under GFCI towards the construction of new buildings shall be capped at Rs.3,000/sq. ft. of built-up area. 
  3. The annual CAPEX assistance disbursed shall be capped to the total annual operating expenditure of the eligible IT/ITeS Units.
data.beneficiaries: All existing IT/ITeS units whho are developer/consortium of developers for the creation of  IT township or IT city are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Eligible Unit means any existing unit having a minimum of 15 employees on its payroll. 
  2. Gross fixed capital investment must be less than Rs.25000 lakhs. 
  3. The expenditure incurred under GFCI towards the construction of new buildings shall be capped at Rs.3,000/sq. ft. of built-up area. 
  4. The annual CAPEX assistance disbursed shall be capped to the total annual operating expenditure of the eligible IT/ITeS Units.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.context: Gujarat is committed towards promoting faster and inclusive growth in the IT/ITeS Sector. The IT/ITeS Policy (2022-27) will enable an innovative ecosystem, establish a robust infrastructure and further develop the state's IT talent pool.
data.objective: To establish the state as a hub for innovation in Emerging and Advanced Technologies.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides one-time CAPEX support of up to 25% of the eligible CAPEX expenditure, subject to a maximum ceiling of Rs. 10000 lakhs for creating (co-working space, IT/ITeS park). 
  2. The Government may provide support through the following non-fiscal incentives: Relaxation in zoning and land use laws, such as permission for mixed land use (residential, commercial and industrial) Assistance in obtaining other necessary statutory clearances Relaxation in Floor Space Index (FSI) norms for IT office space Utilities/infrastructure support up to the doorstep
data.how_to_apply: The eligible applicants can apply through Incentive Management Portal : https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/
data.funding_facilitator: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.funding_mechanism: The disbursement will be done in twenty (20) equal quarterly installments.
data.highlights:
The Policy aims to achieve the following milestones in the next five years: 

1) Place Gujarat in the top five performing states of India in IT Sector 

2) Increase Gujarat's annual IT exports from Rs 3000 Crores to Rs 25000 Crores. 

3) Generate more than one lakh new IT/ITeS jobs in the State. 

4) Become the national leader in terms of world-class IT infrastructure, Data Centers and Innovation Centers in Emerging Technologies.
data.additional_info: Support shall be provided as a reimbursement towards actual expenditure incurred for creating IT office space (co-working space, IT/ITeS park) in the IT city/ township.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Company Registration Documents (Certificate of Incorporation, Partnership Deed, etc.)
GST Registration Certificate
PAN Card of the Company
Project Proposal and Business Plan
Employee Count and Employment Details
Land Documents (Title/Lease Agreement)
EPF and ESI Registration Certificates
Audited Financial Statements
Bank Statements or Financial Institution Documents
Commencement Certificate
In-principle Approval (if applicable)
Statutory Compliance Documents (Factory Act, Minimum Wages Act, etc.)
Other Supporting Documents as per Specific Schemes
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Department of Science & Technology, Block No.7, 5th Floor,New Sachivalaya, Gandhinagar
Phone :  079-23259999
Email : secdst[at]gujarat[dot]gov[dot]in
data.beneficiary: Specific Industry - Proprietorship, Private Limited Company, Public Company, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) - Gujarat - All MSMEs and Non MSMEs
